reviewText: if your looking for erotic.. this one has more close-ups than part 3.. must have been different photographer or cameraman but same ladies as 3...Some problems with lighting.. they should have used lights or reflectors... My photography is that bad!

There are 5 women featured.  None totally shaved.  The bulk of this was filmed outside which is it's downfall because a lot of what you're looking at is in the shade or in the shadow because the sun is behind them.  Lighting very poor.  Not enough close ups.  I thought the best part was the shower scenes in the end.  If I had paid full price for this one I'd be really upset.  I ended up fast forwarding through much of it.

If you're looking for exercise instructions, this is not for you. There are five brunettes here.  The ladies are various shapes and sizes.  Most guys could probably find at least two bodies that they really liked looking-at in this group. There is five minutes of undressing, 10 minutes of "stretching," 20 minutes of a "workout," five minutes playing catch with a soccer ball in a small pool, and ten minutes of shower scenes.  There is no cinematography, no choreography, no technical instructions - just amateur, home-style, video shot by two guys with camcorders. The audio is almost completely dubbed-over by one lady and some unmemorable and un-synchronized music.  This is not pornography, it is not sexual or explicit. Some of the shower section is a little sensual.  I watched this entire video while working out on my elliptical machine - and it kept my attention during the whole 50 minutes - making the time pass quickly.  This is my first look at any of these "nude" series tapes and it was good enough to make me want to try viewing the others.  So, for me, it delivered what I expected: something pleasant and inspirational to pass the time working-out.

I give this video a rating of one star, for the only girl in this video with breast implants. Overall, I thought I would be getting "intense" exercises and not some lazy girls looking bored. The only other good thing about this video was when they went to take a shower. As a nudiest living in a nude colony, I have seen far better aerobics done by my fellow nudiests. So I actually saw some breast bouncing, unlike this video. Also unlike this video, the cameraman knows where to zoom in!
